skins.shipDescription: I am the newest addition to the Muse System, Illustrious. Through my songs, I shall spread the light of love and peace¡ª Don't you think that's a wonderful thing?
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the name ship of the Illustrious-class armored carriers... Oh, should I call myself "Idol Illustrious" now? I lack experience, but I will do what I must for the sake of peace.
skins.acquisition: I am the newest addition to the Muse System, Illustrious. Through my songs, I shall spread the light of love and peace¡ª Don't you think that's a wonderful thing?
skins.login: Good day, Commander. What will we be practicing today?
skins.details: One, two, one two, Ah... Thank you, Commander. I'm not sure why I just can't keep my balance...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What if we had a little tea party after our next practice?
skins.secretaryIdle2: When one watches Tashkent and the girls dance so vivaciously, it makes one's heart pound. Hehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The theme of my costume is "the starry cosmos," isn't that romantic? How delightful. Hehe.
skins.secretaryTouch: Are we practicing for handshake events? All right, thank you very much, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, do remember to maintain decorum when touching an idol.
